title: Across Bridge Stats
rawQuery:
WITH 
  transfers AS (
    --SELECT * FROM query_3038858
    SELECT * FROM dune.risk_labs.result_across_transfers_foundation
  ),
  daily_temp AS (
    SELECT
      date_trunc('day', block_time) as day,
      count(*) as daily_transfers,
      sum(value) as daily_volume,
      sum(if(src_chain = 'ethereum', value, 0)) as ethereum_out_volume,
      sum(if(src_chain = 'arbitrum', value, 0)) as arbitrum_out_volume,
      sum(if(src_chain = 'optimism', value, 0)) as optimism_out_volume,
      sum(if(src_chain = 'polygon', value, 0)) as polygon_out_volume,
      sum(if(src_chain = 'base', value, 0)) as base_out_volume,
      sum(if(src_chain = 'zksync', value, 0)) as zksync_out_volume,
      sum(if(src_chain = 'boba', value, 0)) as boba_out_volume,
      sum(if(src_chain = 'linea', value, 0)) as linea_out_volume,
      sum(if(src_chain = 'mode', value, 0)) as mode_out_volume,
      sum(if(src_chain = 'lisk', value, 0)) as lisk_out_volume,
      sum(if(src_chain = 'blast', value, 0)) as blast_out_volume,
      sum(if(src_chain = 'redstone', value, 0)) as redstone_out_volume,
      sum(if(src_chain = 'scroll', value, 0)) as scroll_out_volume,
      sum(if(src_chain = 'zora', value, 0)) as zora_out_volume,
      sum(if(src_chain = 'worldchain', value, 0)) as worldchain_out_volume,
      sum(if(src_chain = 'aleph_zero', value, 0)) as aleph_zero_out_volume,
      sum(if(src_chain = 'ink', value, 0)) as ink_out_volume,
      sum(if(src_chain = 'soneium', value, 0)) as soneium_out_volume,
      sum(if(src_chain = 'unichain', value, 0)) as unichain_out_volume,
      sum(if(src_chain = 'lens', value, 0)) as lens_out_volume,
      sum(if(src_chain = 'bnb', value, 0)) as bnb_out_volume,
      
      sum(if(dst_chain = 'ethereum', value, 0)) as ethereum_in_volume,
      sum(if(dst_chain = 'arbitrum', value, 0)) as arbitrum_in_volume,
      sum(if(dst_chain = 'optimism', value, 0)) as optimism_in_volume,
      sum(if(dst_chain = 'polygon', value, 0)) as polygon_in_volume,
      sum(if(dst_chain = 'base', value, 0)) as base_in_volume,
      sum(if(dst_chain = 'zksync', value, 0)) as zksync_in_volume,
      sum(if(dst_chain = 'boba', value, 0)) as boba_in_volume,
      sum(if(dst_chain = 'linea', value, 0)) as linea_in_volume,
      sum(if(dst_chain = 'mode', value, 0)) as mode_in_volume,
      sum(if(dst_chain = 'lisk', value, 0)) as lisk_in_volume,
      sum(if(dst_chain = 'blast', value, 0)) as blast_in_volume,
      sum(if(dst_chain = 'redstone', value, 0)) as redstone_in_volume,
      sum(if(dst_chain = 'scroll', value, 0)) as scroll_in_volume,
      sum(if(dst_chain = 'zora', value, 0)) as zora_in_volume,
      sum(if(dst_chain = 'worldchain', value, 0)) as worldchain_in_volume,
      sum(if(dst_chain = 'aleph_zero', value, 0)) as aleph_zero_in_volume,
      sum(if(dst_chain = 'ink', value, 0)) as ink_in_volume,
      sum(if(dst_chain = 'soneium', value, 0)) as soneium_in_volume,
      sum(if(dst_chain = 'unichain', value, 0)) as unichain_in_volume,
      sum(if(dst_chain = 'lens', value, 0)) as lens_in_volume,
      sum(if(dst_chain = 'bnb', value, 0)) as bnb_in_volume,
      
      sum(relay_fee_in_usd) as daily_relay_fee,
      sum(lp_fee_in_usd) as daily_lp_fee,
      sum(relay_fee_in_usd + lp_fee_in_usd) as daily_fee
    FROM transfers 
    GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1
  ),
  daily_v3_lp_fees AS(
    SELECT dt AS day,
    SUM(COALESCE(-bundle_lp_fees_usd,0)) as daily_relay_fee,
    SUM(COALESCE(bundle_lp_fees_usd,0)) as daily_lp_fee,
    0 AS daily_fee
    --FROM query_3460715
    FROM dune.risk_labs.result_across_v_3_lp_fees_via_execute_root_bundle_method
    GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1
  ),
  daily AS(
      SELECT d.day,
      d.daily_transfers,
      d.daily_volume,
      d.ethereum_out_volume,
      d.arbitrum_out_volume,
      d.optimism_out_volume,
      d.polygon_out_volume,
      d.base_out_volume,
      d.zksync_out_volume,
      d.boba_out_volume,
      d.linea_out_volume,
      d.mode_out_volume,
      d.lisk_out_volume,
      d.blast_out_volume,
      d.redstone_out_volume,
      d.scroll_out_volume,
      d.zora_out_volume,
      d.worldchain_out_volume,
      d.aleph_zero_out_volume,
      d.ink_out_volume,
      d.soneium_out_volume,
      d.unichain_out_volume,
      d.lens_out_volume, 
      d.bnb_out_volume,  
      
      d.ethereum_in_volume,
      d.arbitrum_in_volume,
      d.optimism_in_volume,
      d.polygon_in_volume,
      d.base_in_volume,
      d.zksync_in_volume,
      d.boba_in_volume,
      d.linea_in_volume,
      d.mode_in_volume,
      d.lisk_in_volume,
      d.blast_in_volume,
      d.redstone_in_volume,
      d.scroll_in_volume,
      d.zora_in_volume,
      d.worldchain_in_volume,
      d.aleph_zero_in_volume,
      d.ink_in_volume,
      d.soneium_in_volume,
      d.unichain_in_volume,
      d.lens_in_volume, 
      d.bnb_in_volume,

      CASE 
        WHEN (d.daily_relay_fee + COALESCE(f.daily_relay_fee,0)) > 0 THEN d.daily_relay_fee + COALESCE(f.daily_relay_fee,0)
        WHEN d.daily_relay_fee < 0 THEN 0--Likely an issue with input_amount_usd - output_amount_usd on Across V3 Transfers
        ELSE d.daily_relay_fee 
      END AS daily_relay_fee,
      CASE
        WHEN d.daily_lp_fee + COALESCE(f.daily_lp_fee,0) < d.daily_fee THEN d.daily_lp_fee + COALESCE(f.daily_lp_fee,0)
        ELSE d.daily_lp_fee
      END AS daily_lp_fee,
      d.daily_fee
      FROM daily_temp d
      LEFT JOIN daily_v3_lp_fees f
        ON d.day = f.day
  )
SELECT
  *,
  daily_fee / daily_volume as overall_slippage,
  sum(daily_transfers) over (order by day) as cumulative_transfers,
  avg(daily_volume) over (order by day ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND 0 FOLLOWING) AS "7_Days_MA",
  avg(daily_volume) over (order by day ROWS BETWEEN 29 PRECEDING AND 0 FOLLOWING) AS "30_Days_MA",
  sum(daily_volume) over (order by day) as cumulative_volume,
  sum(daily_fee) over (order by day) as cumulative_fee
FROM daily
ORDER BY 1 DESC

analysisResult.commentedQuery:
-- Across 프로토콜의 크로스체인 전송 데이터 분석 쿼리

WITH 
  transfers AS (
    -- 기본 크로스체인 전송 데이터 소스
    SELECT * FROM dune.risk_labs.result_across_transfers_foundation
  ),
  daily_temp AS (
    -- 일별 전송 지표 계산
    SELECT
      date_trunc('day', block_time) as day,
      count(*) as daily_transfers,                    -- 일일 전송 건수
      sum(value) as daily_volume,                     -- 일일 총 전송 볼륨
      -- 소스 체인별 출금 볼륨 계산
      sum(if(src_chain = 'ethereum', value, 0)) as ethereum_out_volume,
      sum(if(src_chain = 'arbitrum', value, 0)) as arbitrum_out_volume,
      -- [이하 체인별 출금 볼륨 집계 생략...]
      
      -- 목적지 체인별 입금 볼륨 계산
      sum(if(dst_chain = 'ethereum', value, 0)) as ethereum_in_volume,
      sum(if(dst_chain = 'arbitrum', value, 0)) as arbitrum_in_volume,
      -- [이하 체인별 입금 볼륨 집계 생략...]
      
      -- 수수료 관련 지표
      sum(relay_fee_in_usd) as daily_relay_fee,       -- 일일 릴레이 수수료
      sum(lp_fee_in_usd) as daily_lp_fee,            -- 일일 LP 수수료
      sum(relay_fee_in_usd + lp_fee_in_usd) as daily_fee  -- 일일 총 수수료
    FROM transfers 
    GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1
  ),
  daily_v3_lp_fees AS(
    -- V3 LP 수수료 데이터 집계
    SELECT dt AS day,
    SUM(COALESCE(-bundle_lp_fees_usd,0)) as daily_relay_fee,
    SUM(COALESCE(bundle_lp_fees_usd,0)) as daily_lp_fee,
    0 AS daily_fee
    FROM dune.risk_labs.result_across_v_3_lp_fees_via_execute_root_bundle_method
    GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1
  ),
  daily AS(
      -- 일별 데이터 최종 집계 및 수수료 보정
      SELECT d.day,
      d.daily_transfers,
      d.daily_volume,
      -- [체인별 볼륨 데이터 필드 생략...]
      
      -- 수수료 계산 로직 (V3 수수료 포함)
      CASE 
        WHEN (d.daily_relay_fee + COALESCE(f.daily_relay_fee,0)) > 0 THEN d.daily_relay_fee + COALESCE(f.daily_relay_fee,0)
        WHEN d.daily_relay_fee < 0 THEN 0  -- V3 전송의 입출금 금액 차이 보정
        ELSE d.daily_relay_fee 
      END AS daily_relay_fee,
      CASE
        WHEN d.daily_lp_fee + COALESCE(f.daily_lp_fee,0) < d.daily_fee THEN d.daily_lp_fee + COALESCE(f.daily_lp_fee,0)
        ELSE d.daily_lp_fee
      END AS daily_lp_fee,
      d.daily_fee
      FROM daily_temp d
      LEFT JOIN daily_v3_lp_fees f
        ON d.day = f.day
  )
-- 최종 결과 계산
SELECT
  *,
  daily_fee / daily_volume as overall_slippage,        -- 전체 슬리피지 비율
  sum(daily_transfers) over (order by day) as cumulative_transfers,  -- 누적 전송 건수
  avg(daily_volume) over (order by day ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND 0 FOLLOWING) AS "7_Days_MA",  -- 7일 이동평균
  avg(daily_volume) over (order by day ROWS BETWEEN 29 PRECEDING AND 0 FOLLOWING) AS "30_Days_MA",  -- 30일 이동평균
  sum(daily_volume) over (order by day) as cumulative_volume,  -- 누적 거래량
  sum(daily_fee) over (order by day) as cumulative_fee  -- 누적 수수료
FROM daily
ORDER BY 1 DESC
analysisResult.summary: Across 프로토콜의 크로스체인 전송 데이터를 분석하는 쿼리로, 일별 전송 볼륨, 체인별 입출금 현황, 수수료 수익을 계산합니다. V3 프로토콜의 LP 수수료를 포함하여 종합적인 성과 지표를 산출합니다.
